extendedInfo.description: Cheap Calls: Don't waste your time with bogus free offers and poor quality.  We offer the best rates amongst all premium call quality providers.  The new BudgetVOIP.net v4 dialer lets you make cheap calls to national or international destinations.  BudgetVOIP.net is the best Android voip solution.  Save on your mobile phone costs right away by using this mobile voip application.BudgetVOIP.net must not be mistaken for Viber, Zoiper, Bria, Nimbuzz, Skype, Fring, Rynga, Actionvoip, Dellmont or Betamax or even budgetvoip.com.  We are a premium quality service.  BudgetVOIP.net coverage is every country worldwide.  We also have wholesale and reseller packages.BudgetVOIP.net offers:- Most call rates are fixed to $0.01 cent per minute.- All calls are billed per second.- Register on http://www.budgetvoip.net for an International FREE CALLS test account.- Register on http://www.voipservices.co.za for a South African FREE CALLS test account.- Instant Control panel access for itemized billing.Phone features:- Supports most codecs including G729, ULAW, etc.- Wi-Fi and 3G Cabaple- Bluetooth- Echo cancellation- Uses your phones contact list- Call historyGet a local area number in your country to terminate on your mobile.Local Numbers available for over fourty countries, listed below:AustraliaAustriaBelgiumBrazilBulgariaCanadaCroatiaCyprusCzech RepublicDenmarkEstoniaFinlandFranceGermanyGreeceHungaryIrelandItalyJapanLatviaLithuaniaLuxembourgMaltaNetherlandsNew ZealandNorwayPeruPolandPortugalRomaniaSlovakiaSloveniaSouth AfricaSpainSwedenSwitzerlandUnited KingdomUnited States
